articles.description: While jury deliberated in Toronto, news broke that the Canadian rock musician had been charged with another sexual assault
articles.content: The Canadian rock musician Jacob Hoggard has been found guilty of violently raping a young woman, but acquitted of sexually assaulting a second all while facing a new, third charge of sexual assault.… [+3463 chars]
